title: Whispers in the Wind
body:
The breeze speaks softly of stories old,
Where dreams were silver and hearts were gold...

title: Moonlight Solace
body:
Under the moonâ€™s forgiving glow,
I let the silent verses flow...

title: Guru kripa
body:
Aapke charno me thodi si jagah mil jaaye to
	Mera ud-dhaar ho jaaye !! - 2 times

aapko apne dil me basaa kar rakh liya hai maine
	taki aapse hi pyaar ho jaye

Mujhko yu bhatakne ki zarurat nai hai idhar udhar - 2 times
	khud ko aainey (mirror) me dekh lu to
		har roz aapka deedaar ho jaaye
